meanings.definition: A thin strip of material used for binding or tying
meanings.sent1: I used rubber bands to tie my hair back.
meanings.sent2: The bands on the package kept it closed.
meanings.sent3: The bands on the gift wrap made it look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent4: The bands of sunlight streamed through the window.
meanings.sent5: The bands of color on the butterfly's wings were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A group of people joined together for a common purpose
meanings.sent1: The bands of volunteers cleaned up the park.
meanings.sent2: The music bands at the festival played different genres.
meanings.sent3: The bands of friends worked together to build a sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: The bands of protesters marched for their cause.
meanings.sent5: The bands of students formed study groups to help each other.

meanings.definition: A range of frequencies within a given electromagnetic spectrum
meanings.sent1: The radio bands allow for different channels.
meanings.sent2: The wifi bands determine the speed of the internet connection.
meanings.sent3: The bands of signals can sometimes interfere with each other.
meanings.sent4: The bands of light in the rainbow create a beautiful spectrum.
meanings.sent5: The bands of sound from the concert filled the room.

meanings.definition: A flat, thin strip of material forming a loop used to hold something together
meanings.sent1: She tied the bands of fabric around the gift box.
meanings.sent2: The bands of elastic kept the sheets in place.
meanings.sent3: The bands of paper held the pages of the book together.
meanings.sent4: The bands of metal secured the fence in place.
meanings.sent5: The bands of rubber kept the jar lid sealed tight.

meanings.definition: A group of musicians playing together
meanings.sent1: The bands at the music festival played different genres.
meanings.sent2: The marching bands performed during the parade.
meanings.sent3: The bands of friends formed a music group for fun.
meanings.sent4: The bands of singers harmonized beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The bands of instruments created a symphony of sound.
